name: Aaliyah
bio: Aaliyah is the president of Leafsters 327, the local chapter of the national leaf blowers union. The only thing this expert in neighborhood beautification loves more than a clear sidewalk is a strong labor contract! And if the bosses don't comply? They’re not blowing anywhere!
appearance: Aaliyah is a tie-dye purple and violet galaxy shark with two fins on each side and white starbursts covering their whole body. They have two dorsal fins on their head and on their lower back with a tail at the bottom. They have a round, lavender belly with silver stars. They have round black eyes and a small smile.

name: Aarin
bio: Meet Aarin! Did you know that she's helping her friends publish their very own cookbook?Boyercooks the food, Aarin writes the captions, and her BFFSellyis the food photographer! The best part? They get to test all the yummy recipes after! Grab a fork! They'd love to share!
appearance: Aarin is an alpaca with a light blue body. She has fluffy blue tie-dye fur and a light blue muzzle. She has round black eyes, one winking and one open. Her snout and mouth are black.

name: Aaron
bio: Aaron is a powerful dragon whose main focus is to whirl you all through the nice blue sky. He teaches others to look out for one another and to be aware of obstacles that could get in the way. He glides effortlessly in the sky while keeping an eye out to make sure you're safe and secure. Keep your seats buckled, your lap bar secured and hold on tight. Aaron is taking you on a ride around the town.
appearance: Aaron is a grey dragon with grey wings, ears and red horns. He has grey inner wings, and a red horn from the top of his head to his tail. He has a grey muzzle and a yellow belly with black nostrils with white fangs. His eyes are round and black rimmed in yellow

name: Abbitt
bio: Abbitt is a marine biologist helping regrow coral reefs in his area. He's the perfect scientist for the job since he can hold his breath underwater for several minutes! Abbitt knows the health of all coral reefs is important for 'Mallows everywhere, and hopes you'll join his team on the next reef dive!
appearance: Abbitt is a dark grey tapir with a grey trunk, a large white stripe across the center of his body and pink inner ears. He has black, rounded eyes.

name: Abby
bio: Meet Abby; this water enthusiast takes her passion to the next level as the Head Lifeguard at a waterpark! Monitoring slides and ensuring Squishmallows' safety is Abby's thing; at closing time, Abby lets loose and slips down her favorite slide: The Sea Creature Funnel!
appearance: Abby is a pink octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles. She has round black eyes and a smiling black mouth.

name: Abdul
bio: Abdul just got back from a five month archaeological dig in the dessert! This paleontologist was researching a newly discovered bone thought to be an ancient dinosaur. Back in the classroom, Abdul teaches his students everything he learned. Want to see his slideshow presentation?
appearance: Abdul is a griffon, a mythical creature that combines a lion and an eagle, with an orange head that ends with feathers and fuzzy tufts coming from the sides. He has orange wings with yellow tips and his body is cantaloupe color with a white belly. His tail is peach with an orange fuzzy tip, he has a yellow beak with orange nostrils and black eyes.

name: Abe
bio: Say hello to Abe. He’s the top student in his class and is studying hard to become a teacher! His favorite subjects are English and History, but he also loves to do science experiments in his spare time! Want to try out a new experiment with Abe?
appearance: Abe is a light green bearded dragon, a type of lizard. He has two fringes on his sides. He has a white fuzzy belly and three blue markings on his back, above his tail.

name: Abel
bio: Abel wrote a short story! It's the story of a young manatee taking bass lessons and performing in spring recitals. His own fond memories of these parties make the story so real. Abel just submitted his story to a music magazine—he'll mail you a copy when it prints!
appearance: Abel is a teal aquatic mammal with small but wide flippers. He has a light blue snout which resembles an upside-down, rounded heart. His snout is spotted with teal and he has small nostrils the same color. He has closed, black eyes, a light blue belly, and he is wearing white bunny ears with a purple, pink, and teal plaid pattern.

name: Abelita
bio: Abelita treats all kinds of 'Mallow skin and fur at her dermatology clinic. Got a rash on your paw? No prob! Abelita has the perfect little bar of soap for that. This horse is on a mission to help all her patients glow from inside out! Ready to schedule an appointment with Abelita
appearance: Abelita is a lavender horse with a white stripe on her forehead. She also has a cream muzzle belly. Her whole body is covered with lavender splotches, the same color as her fluffy mane and tail. She has round, black eyes and black nostrils. The insides of her ears are cream.

name: Abena
bio: While her friendsOzandAfiyahlove to be in the spotlight, Abena is quite shy. She prefers giving direction from the sidelines and making sure everything is ready behind the curtains. Abena is very organized and keeps her friends on schedule wherever they go.
appearance: Abena is a succulent plant inside of a tan pot that makes up her body. The rim and bottom of the tan pot are white with various brown, blue, and purple shapes. She has rows of green leaves on top coming out of the pot. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Abilene
bio: Abilene is a creative director who loves to have fun. She picks a new game for her team to play each month to get their creative juices flowing. her dream is to work for a game company and play games all day! What game should she try next?
appearance: Abilene is an ostrich with a hot pink body. Her head and wings are covered in rainbow fluff, which is predominantly yellow, pink and blue. She has a rounded, triangular beak which is hot pink, and round, black eyes with straight lashes.

name: Ace
bio: Version 1:Lights, camera, action! Need someone to make you laugh? Get to know Ace! He is ready to be your next big thing. Ace is the actor- extraordinaire born on January 4th. Where is his favorite place to be? The stage of course! He isn’t shy if you couldn’t tell. Ace wants to one day write and direct his own film.
appearance: Ace is a turquoise unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. His ears, belly and nose are all white, and his nose also has pink nostrils. He has a short, sparkly lilac horn with a red swirl wrapped around it. He has black, oval-shaped eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Achilles
bio: Achilles is a male model! He faces a lot of things like prejudice from people thinking he doesn't have a brain or whatever, but he actually does have a brain, hater tots. He also has a pair of eyes. A mouth. Other body parts he can't really remember the names of - oh! Chin and ears!Chin and ears!
appearance: Achilles is a yellow lion. He has a fluffy brown which covers his head. He two black antennae with yellow fuzzy tips and has silver wings on each side of his body. He has a black and yellow striped belly. He has a white patch on his mouth and has round, black eyes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Achim
bio: Meet Achim. He is all about self-love. He writes positive affirmations on his mirror every morning! He's great at making others feel loved too! This 'Mallow gives the best compliments and always encourage others to be proud of exactly who they are!
appearance: Achim is a tan lion with a white muzzle. The colorful mane which covers his head is a fluoro rainbow, with lots of pinks, blues, yellows and greens. He has a belly striped with the colors of the pride flag. He has closed eyes with short lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Ada
bio: Ada loves foraging mushrooms for lunch. From chili shiitake sliders to portobello pasta, her midday meals are nutritious, delicious, and fungalicious. Can you guess her favorite pizza topping?
appearance: Ada has a cream-colored body with green floral pattern patches. The inside of her ears are white. She has yellow horns, black eyes with eyelashes, and a pink snout.

name: Adabelle
bio: Meet Adabelle. She loves dogs, yoga, and meeting new people! She wants to open a dog-friendly yoga studio called Downward Dog! Will you join her pup-tastic yoga class?
appearance: Adabelle is a bright pink strawberry frog. She has a pale pink belly and matching seeds scattered across her body. She has round, black eyes, small nostrils, a small smile and hot pink blush. She also has three green leaves sprouting from the top of her head.

name: Adam
bio: Adam helps technology-challenged superheroes set up their work computers. From creating email signatures to installing anti-villain virus protection this IT whiz does it all! His costumers are so appreciative that they even gave him his own superhero nickname: Captain Computer!
appearance: Adam is a pterodactyl, an ancient flying reptile. His body is a cobalt blue with a fuzzy white belly. He has a light blue beak with cobalt blue nostrils. The outside of his wings are cobalt blue with splotches and silver inner wings. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Adderley
bio: Get ready for Adderley's pasta surprise! This sloth tosses noodles all night at her tiny pasta bistro. From bucatini to ravioli, Adderley makes them all by hand. So what's the surprise? The menu changes daily, so you never know what kind of tasty combinations chef Adderley might have dreamed up. She hopes you love cheese!
appearance: Adderley is a sloth with a white face and a rainbow, tie-dyed body with a  silver a belly. Rose gold banded markings over her eyes and a silver muzzle. She has round, black eyes with lashes, a pink gold, oval-shaped nose and an open mouth.

name: Addison
bio: Addison seeks travel wherever she goes. She is constantly learning new languages, so that she can make friends across the globe! Where will your next adventure be with Addison?
appearance: Addison is a green sheep with a white face. Her inner ears are also white. She has round black eyes with short lashes, light pink blushing cheeks, and a light pink mouth.

name: Adela
bio: Got a toothache? Have no fear--Adela the dentist has arrived to the rescue! She helps remove tooth decay, fills cavities, and repair fractured tooth. Adela even double checks your enamel strength. Go home feeling well cared for, and with minty fresh breath, too!
appearance: Adela is a tan basset hound with white markings on her face. She has long tan ears, black round eyes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Adelaide
bio: Meet Adelaide. This is one sassy 'Mallow who LOVES all things fashion. She is known for having a great sense of style and speaking her mind, she's got enough sass for all eight tentacles! If you need a second opinion, give her a call!
appearance: Adelaide is an octopus with a pink and purple tie-dye pattern. She has a sparkly, shimmery pink belly. She has a round body with eight short, metallic tentacles, each of which is a different color (including purple, hot pink, rainbow and light pink). She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Adelle
bio: Meet Adelle. This far out ‘Mallow loves her film camera, shopping for vintage thrifted clothing and listening to rock! She loves doing groovy photo shoots with her friends and putting them on her fashion blog! Want to join? She’d love to style you!
appearance: Adelle is an orange lava lamp that has lava oozing on her body. She is grey on the top and bottom of her body. Her face consists of black eyes and a red smile.

name: Adila
bio: Adila is a bit nervous around new people, but she's trying to be brave and speak in front of others by joining the debate team. Adila's secret advantage is that she is a great writer so words come to her naturally. Would you help her practice for her first big debate?
appearance: Adila is a brown antelope with two curved, chocolate brown horns atop her head. Her ears, which are curled, sit below. She has pure white markings on her lower muzzle and around her eyes, with a dark brown line running through the center of her eye markings. Her inner ears and belly are off-white. She has round, black eyes with curly lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Adin
bio: Meet Adin. He loves black and white movies, thrift shopping and even owns his own video store. Are you ready to go back in time with Adin?
appearance: Adin is a grey arcade cabinet video game with a blue top and bottom. He has two circular red buttons and a red joy stick on the left of his body. In the middle of his body is a rectangular black screen with a video game of a spaceship, stars, and meteors similar to the arcade game Asteroids. Above the screen, Adin has two round black eyes and a smiling red mouth.

name: Adjani
bio: Adjani is throwing a 'save the rainforest' benefit concert! This 4th grade class president can't wait to hear her classmates perform and even wrote a song of her own. Adjani is calling it 'Think Global, Act Local' and hopes it inspires her community to do the very same!
appearance: Adjani is a brown cow with a winking right eye and a stripe of pink running through the center of her face. She has small, white horns. The inside of her ears are pink and she has a white muzzle with pink nostrils. Her belly is a sunset pattern.

name: Adonis
bio: Adonis is a patron of the language arts (or, as they call it in his "native tongue": ooh-ooh-eee-eee-ooh). He just commissioned a benefit reading of greetings from around the world and can't wait for a star-studded night of salutations. You didn't hear it from Adonis, but Kathleen Syntax is doing ni hao ma!
appearance: Adonis is a yellow monkey with a dark orange mane and pale blue face. He has small, yellow ears and a yellow body with a dark orange belly. He has a tuft of dark orange fuzz on top of his head. His muzzle is round and short with dark blue nostrils and curved mouth.

name: Adrian
bio: Meet Adrian. He wants to be a radio DJ when he grows up. He loves eclectic music from all around the world! There’s nothing he loves more than discovering a new song he’s never heard before and then sharing it with his friends. Got a song you love? Share it with Adrian!

name: Adrie
bio: Say hey to Adrie! Adrie tours all over the globe with her flute! Since she's often on the move, Adrie writes postcards to all her closest 'Mallows friends. She always makes sure to write them with pretty colors and adds lots of stickers! Want to be pen pals with Adrie?
appearance: Adrie is a pink tie-dye caticorn. Her belly and inner ears are colored white. She has a white, shimmery horn with a pink swirl. She has black rounded eyes with short lashes and a pastel pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers on each side.

name: Adrienne
bio: Adrienne works at a hair salon. She uses her long cactus spines as cutting shears and a hair comb! Adrienne can cut and style any kind of 'Mallow hair and loves to offer a relaxing scalp massage—although her associateJackiecan take care of that.
appearance: Adrienne is a purple cactus with two, uneven cactus arms on her sides. There are yellow spikes all over her body except for her pink belly. She has two flowers with petals and orange pistil one on her head and one on her left arm. She has pink blush, black eyes with lashes, and a pink mouth.

name: Adrina
bio: Adrina is a periwinkle blue caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly, as well as the spiral on her horn, are striped in rainbow. The horn itself is a shimmery silver. She has closed eyes and a pale pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.
appearance: Adrina is a periwinkle blue caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly, as well as the spiral on her horn, are striped in rainbow. The horn itself is a shimmery silver. She has closed eyes and a pale pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Aegi
bio: Aegi loves helping others! This sensitive-yet-straightforward dragon gives the best advice around, especially when it comes to fashion. Though she might not be much of a morning 'Mallow, Aegi is always happy to wake up to a day full of sushi, handbag shopping, and quality time with her bestie!
appearance: Aegi is a rose-pink dragon with silver, glittery horns and wing webbing. She has black eyes, white inner ears and muzzle with pink nostrils. Her belly is a pastel pink with a Sakura flower and petal pattern on it.

name: Aerope
bio: Aerope can’t imagine life without music. She’s always singing, humming, or playing the lyre, even underwater. Actually, Aerope gets her best song ideas while swimming deep in the quiet seas. So listen closely next time you're by the shore—it could be Aerope singing just for you
appearance: Aerope is a purple monster with black horns with navy fin-like flaps with purple lines on the sides of her body, and a navy belly. She has navy spots on the right side of her face. She has mischievous with lashes and a red mouth with pointy white teeth.

name: Afiyah
bio: Meet Afiyah. She loves to sing and dance along withOz; they make a great dancing duo. Afiyah has been dancing most of her life and says that dancing is like the air she needs to breathe. Between her talent and her determination, she is one show-stopping succulent.
appearance: Afiyah is a succulent plant inside of a pink pot that makes up her body. She has rows of leaves on top that are green with pink edges. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling pink mouth.

name: Agnes Rose
bio: Preeee-senting Contestant #42: Agnes Rose! From Junior Queen of the Galaxy to Little Miss Baked Potato, the only thing Agnes Rose loses at beauty pageants is the occasional bobby pin. With her signature talent—complimenting the judges in iambic pentameter—it’s not hard to figure out why!
appearance: Agnes Rose is a pink ostrich with black wings, and her head is pink. Her body is charcoal black with a stone grey tummy and white fluff on. Her face consist of black round eyes with and she has a pink beak with few black dots has her nose. She has a tuft of white hair.

name: Agnolo
bio: Show and tell happens once a week at Agnolo's school, and makes him super nervous. He always freezes when it's time to stand up in front of the class! So Agnolo decided to start practicing his presentation at home. Could he show you what he's prepared so far?
appearance: Agnolo is a navy blue frog with a bluish-grey colored belly. his eyes sit on top of his head and are black rimmed in lime. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth. He has dark blue spots all over his body with a tadpole-like tail behind him.

name: Agora
bio: Ding-dong, Agora's calling! Your friendly neighborhood potion rep totes the finest elixirs the Scary Carrie has to offer—from the hair growth potion that may not start with your armpits, to the slumber serum that only makes you sleep-talk your secrets! Be sure to ask for the Fiends & Family Discount!
appearance: Agora is a Caucasian witch with grey hair tied in pigtails. On her head, she wears a witch hat with a pink buckle. She wears a black shirt with black and grey stripped pants. She is holding a potion bottle with pink potion inside of it. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Aicha
bio: Meet Aicha. She is the strongest swimmer in the ocean and the prettiest shell on the beach. When she’s not soaking in the sun, she’s diving into the water to save lives. Whenever Aicha is around, you can guarantee a smile and a fun day in the sun.
appearance: Aicha is a pink seashell with black round eyes and eyelashes, and a red mouth. She has a white belly with silver glitter.

name: Aiden
bio: Whos' ready to change the world? Aiden, this thoughtful mallow tries to think about everyone around them and how to be fair. Even though he's not quite perfect, he hopes he can make a difference.
appearance: Aiden is a grey dragon in the flat, stackable style. They* have holographic black inner ears, horns, spines, and wing webbing. His eyes are black, he has a white muzzle and black nostrils.

name: Aidy
bio: Aidy swims into work with her pep in her fins every morning! Aidy loves being a social worker because she gets to make a difference in the lives of all her clients. When Aidy has a long work walk, her favorite way to unwind is with karaoke night. What song would Aidy play for you?
appearance: Aidy is a whale shark, the largest variety of shark. She has a pink gradient, darker at the top and lighter towards the bottom. She has wavy white stripes running horizontally across his body, accompanied by white spots. She has a fin on each side of her body, one atop her head, one on her back and a pointed tail. She has a large white belly which goes up to her mouth. She has a round, black eyes, a pink, open smiling mouth and two black gills on either cheek.

name: Aika
bio: Aika is a runner who loves the outdoors. She loves to race along the beach or try a new trail in the mountains. She is fast and loves healthy competition. When it's time for a break, she loves to curl up in the sand and soak up some sun. Do you want to race?
appearance: Aika is an axolotl with a rainbow gradient, starting with red on top of her head all the way down to sky blue. She has shimmery silver gills with a blue frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly. She has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Aimee
bio: This chick has got quite the resume! From clubs to competitions to shows and more, Aimee is a busy bee both on and off the floor. In her spare time she plans events that she isn't even a part of and hopes to be in charge of red carpet events someday.
appearance: Aimee is a bright yellow bird with a pale yellow belly and round, white markings around her eyes. She has a triangular orange beak and fluffy, lemon yellow wings and crest of feathers atop her head. She has round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Aina
bio: Aina is the queen of DIY and loves to create! She especially enjoys baking and shares her delicious confections with the people she loves most. When she grows up, she wants to have a cooking show but also show off her cool DIY designs. Do you want to create with Aina?
appearance: Aina is tie-dyed unicorn who is mostly pink, purple and blue. She has a pink mane and an off-white belly. Her inner ears, horn and muzzle are sparkling silver, and the spiral on her horn and nostrils are hot pink. She has closed eyes with long eyelashes.

name: Ainhoca
bio: Do you hear a whistle? That's Ainhoca stopping traffic to let little 'Mallows cross the street to on their way to school. Ainhoca is a crossing guard at her local elementary school and uses her powerful tail to block cars, or move students to the other side of the road!
appearance: Ainhoca is a dark grey ankylosaurus, a heavily armored type of dinosaur. She has two brown spots on her broad brown plate with four white spikes atop her head. She has a light grey belly with round black eyes and a plain, smiling mouth.

name: Ainsley
bio: "Meet Ainsley, a new gal on the block. She loves making homemade gifts for her friends, crafting with sparkles is her speciality. Join Ainsley at her next craft party!"

name: Aja
bio: Step into the tiny world of Aja, she is one crafty alicorn! Aja’s love for crafts has inspired her to build a tiny world. She makes furniture and loves to show them to her friends. Do you want to see the world she’s building?
appearance: Aja is a ghost pegacorn with a white body. She has a pink mane, and in front of that, a silver horn. She has two glittery white wings. She also has a pink belly that says “Boo!” in silver lettering.

name: Akilah
bio: Akilah is the conductor of an eco-friendly symphonic orchestra. Though she started in the company as a plastic bottle piccolo player, Akilah has a soft spot for the string section. She especially loves the squeaky sound the dental floss viola makes!
appearance: Akilah is a bluish-grey Stingray with a pale blue belly. She has white spots on her back, and tail. She has round black eyes, and a simple red smile. She has two round fins and a pointy tail. She also has three gills on both sides of her front.

name: Akina
bio: Green and blue are Akina's favorite colors and she loves to show them off with brightly colored shoes. Because she loves shoes so much, Akina has a shoe collection like no other. From vintage treasures to one-of-a-kind creations, she has a story for almost every pair!
appearance: Akina is an axolotl with a striped gradient pattern in candy pink, purple and aquamarine blue and a pattern of white stars scattered over the top. She has hot pink gills with an electric blue frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly. She is winking her right eye and has a cat-like smile.

name: Akira
bio: Meet Akira. She loves to read while she soaks up the sun. Her favorite genre is fantasy, she loves to imagine life as some of the characters she reads about. Her latest read is about a magical warrior princess who saves the day, do you have any suggestions for her next read?
appearance: Akira is a sloth with a tie-dye brown body and a grey patch on her face. The banded markings around her eyes and her muzzle are grey. She has a fuzzy white belly. She has a winking expression, a black round nose and cat-like smile.

name: Aksel
bio: Aksel just started his empanada business. He's using a family recipe with added spicy sauce. Aksel takes orders over phone and cooks everything from scratch in his kitchen- he'll even deliver it to you personally! What kind of empanada can Aksel make for you?
appearance: Aksel is a orange and pink Axolotl. He is pink with splotches of orange. He has orange and blue gills with his tummy white and has pink arms. His face consists of round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Alan
bio: Alan is a talented woodworker, and loves coming up with unique gifts that he crafts by hand for all his family and friends. We're excited to see what he comes up with for this Valentine's Day!
appearance: Alan is a brown fox with large, triangular ears. His belly, the insides of his ears and the markings on his eyes and the sides of his face are all white. He has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. He has a glittering emblem on his chest with a small, purple heart atop a larger red one.

name: Alandy
bio: Polka dots and cars are two of Alandy's favorite things. Alandy loves going to car shows and packs a polka dot picnic for lunch. When it comes to music, the classics are what Alandy loves the most. Maybe one day you can ride in Alandy's polka dot cruiser!
appearance: Alandy is a cobalt blue frog with a lighter blue belly. Groups of navy blue spots decorate the sides of their body and in a patch above their nose. Their eyes sit on top of their head, and are black rimmed in white. They have prominent nostrils above their wide, smiling mouth.

name: Alba
bio: Alba believes that simple things in life are best. Like peanut butter sandwiches with crusty bread--that's it! Nothing more, nothing less. Alba packs all her school lunches herself and makes sure to always use reusable containers or recyclable packaging.
appearance: Alba is a peach-colored Mushroom with a fuzzy light yellow belly. Alba has an orange top which is spotted with slightly lighter circles. She has one open eye and a closed one, both having eyelashes. She also has a smiling red mouth.

name: Alberta
bio: Alberta is an ice hockey referee with a "no-penalty-uncalled" approach and a whistle that could cut glass. Off the rink, you might find her baking muffins at the senior home or apologizing for apologizing, but when she goes #refmode, nary a kerfuffle is tolerated. Just ask all 57 players she ejected last season!
appearance: Alberta is an orange cup of latte with whipped cream on top decorated with brown sprinkles and a brown straw with a bow on the right side. She has a tan sleeve with a pink heart in the middle. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a pink smiling mouth with blush.

name: Albinia
bio: Meet Albinia. She has vitiligo and loves that her body is beautiful, marble canvas. She is obsessed with the ocean! Albinia loves going to the beach to hear the waves crash and watch the stars at night, Would you like to join her?
appearance: Albinia is a pink dog with hot pink spots. She has black eyes with white outlines, a pink nose, pink ears, white fur on the bridge of her nose, and a furry belly with the letter K on it.

name: Aldea
bio: Meet Aldea. This earthy mama is a holistic healer. She’s a certified Reiki massage therapist and she loves how much it heals. Aldea also knows all about plants and their healing property. Have a headache? She has the perfect essential oil for you!
appearance: Aldea's body is a gradient that starts with teal at her head and fades into purple at the bottom. She has shiny teal gills with fuzzy teal frills on each side of her head, a fluffy white belly, and a cat-like mouth.

name: Alder
bio: Alder thinks there's nothing like the great outdoors. That's why she goes camping as often as she can - even in her backyard! Alder always brings extra pillows to make her tent super comfy. Roll out your sleeping bag and get ready to go glamping with Alder!
appearance: Alder is a lime-colored owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, orange feathers decorate her chest. She is winking her right eye and has a yellow, triangular beak. Alder wears a large, floppy witch's hat with a black band and gold buckle at the base on the left side of her head.

name: Aldice
bio: Book your appointment with Aldice before her schedule fills up! She's one of the most sought after nail artists, who studied directly under the tutelage ofBop the Bunny. Aldice's social pages feature all of her most popular designs, including the 3D jewel tone finish. It's so shiny!
appearance: Aldice is a purple red panda. She has white markings including on their muzzle, eyebrow-like ovals above their eyes and fluffy cheeks. They have white inner ears. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black. Their belly is lavender patterned.

name: Aldous
bio: Aldous quotes his favorite cowboy movies every chance he gets. He hopes you will catch the reference! Aldous dreams of owning his own ranch one day, so he can make and star in cowboy movies of his own. He's got his camera ready and reckons you'd make a great co-star.
appearance: Aldous is a black bat with triangular ears and wings on either side of his body. His inner ears. wing membrane and fuzzy belly are teal. He has round, black eyes, a pale grey muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth.

name: Aldron
bio: Meet Aldron; he gets a bad rap. He looks a little scary, but he's a total sweetheart. When he's not working at his coffee shop making extra sweet pumpkin spice lattes, he volunteers with his friendBentiat an animal shelter and bottle feeds the baby kittens!
appearance: Aldron is a plague doctor who has a white mask with a bird-like beak on his face. He wears a black collar shirt with a grey belly with purple buttons on it. Aldron also wears a black hat with a purple belt and has rounded black eyes.

name: Ale
bio: Ale likes to celebrate Valentine's day with her friends, being pampered with manis and pedis. When they're done, they get to have a tea party followed by a photo shoot!
appearance: Ale is a tie-dye/rainbow seal with two flippers, one on each side. She has a white muzzle and belly and all her facial features are black. She has two hearts on her belly, one big pink heart and one blue small heart.

name: Alec
bio: Alec buries a little treasure box time capsule for himself every five years! He gathers special knick knacks, notes to his future self, and even snacks! The snacks don't usually survive - but the memories do! Want to make a time capsule with Alec?
appearance: Alec is an olive green creature based on the Loch Ness Monster. He has fins on either side of his body, two small horns and bottle green spots along his back. His bottle green belly has a cord texture with the appearance of horizontal stripes. He has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush.

name: Alejandra
bio: Alejandra loves to play games and go to the beach. If you can't find her winning at card games or reading a book at the beach you might need to check again! She's always ready to try a new game with her friends.
appearance: Alejandra is a bunny with tie-dyed purple fur, and long, floppy ears. Her inner ears and belly are covered in white fur. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a pale pink nose and mouth.

name: Aleka
bio: Meet Aleka. She started making her own candles, and once her friends got a whiff of the scents, they needed to have them too! Now Aleka spends all day making candles, and she loves to create new scents for her friends. Be sure to catch her next candle release!
appearance: Aleka is a pink axolotl with a tie-dye pattern on her body. The pattern is a mix of different shades of pink. Her belly is white and she has large, black eyes and a smiling, cat-like mouth. On her belly, she has two embroided hearts, one a dark pink and the other a lighter pink.

name: Alessi
bio: Alessi is a sleepy fox, she loves to nap because her bed is as soft as a cloud! When she's not napping, you can find her sipping on iced coffee and getting ready for her next class. She teaches gym and also goes to night school to become a nurse.
appearance: Alessi is a musk pink fox with large, triangular ears, the inside of which are hot pink and glittery. She has white markings on her face, including fluffy cheeks. She has closed eyes with long, thick lashes and a black nose and mouth. Her belly and tail are covered in striped rainbow fur which includes yellow, baby pink, sage green, lavender and baby blue shades.

name: Alex
bio: Alex practices karate moves every day in his backyard. He's getting ready to be a stunt-dog in superhero movies! First, he copies what he sees in action scenes, then adds his own flair. Once his friendBambzintroduces him to her film pals, he can prepare a demo tape!
appearance: Alex is a light brown dog with dark brown ears and a light tan belly. His ears are triangular and standing up from his head. He has a dark brown, pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes and his pink toungue sticks out of his mouth.

name: Alexie
bio: Meet Alexie. He's anything but a morning 'Mallow. He loves lazy mornings and sleeping in but he makes exceptions! Have an early morning project you need help with? He'll be the first to lend a helping hand. He just needs a hot cup of coffee and a warm pastry first!
appearance: Alexie is mostly lavender purple with patches of black on his lower right side and on his left ear. He has shiny, triangular horns and round, black eyes. The inside of his ears are pink and his muzzle is white with purple nostrils.

name: Alfie
bio: Alfie works in quality control at the local bouncy ball factory! He ensures all products are fetchable, floatable, and—most important to Alfie—slobberable. Balls that don't meet this criteria are promptly destroyed by Alfie and definitely not taken home for playtime with bestiesDaniandJett!
appearance: Alfie is a grey dog. He has fuzzy black ears on his head and a large tuft of grey fur on his head. He has a fuzzy grey belly with and fuzzy muzzle on his face and fuzzy grey eyebrows. He has round, black eyes with a black nose and mouth,

name: Alfred
bio: Meet Alfred. He stays up to date on the latest health food trends. Right now, Alfred is all about eating leafy greens! He adds them to everything from lunches to smoothies. Alfred has also discovered that roasting Brussels sprouts leads to delicious results! Want to join Alfred's health kick?
appearance: Alfred is a brown moose. He has large,red-squared quilt patterns antlers with the same color as the scarf which stand tall on his head and curve inwards. His muzzle, belly and inner ears are all a light, sandy color. He has round, black eyes and brown nostrils.

name: Alice
bio: Strawberry smoothies and pineapple pizza are two of Alice's favorite things. Even though she has wings - Alice is afraid of heights! She prefers to keep both her feet on the ground, but maybe one day she will soar the skies.
appearance: Alice is a llama pegacorn, a combination of llama, pegasus and unicorn. As such, she has features of all three: a gold unicorn horn, gold pegasus wings and a white llama face with round black eyes and a triangular nose. Her body is pastel pink.

name: Aligail
bio: Aligail helps 'Mallows with all their vacation needs! She's a longtime travel agent who loves to personalize every trip, and even prepares a special booklet of important info every 'Mallow needs while traveling. Be sure to stop by Aligail's office around a holiday - she dresses up for the occasion all week!
appearance: Aligail is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of pink and purple. Pastel colored sprinkles decorate the two upper layers. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. Her lower half is white with sky blue stripes.

name: Alijoon
bio: Get ready for a big Alijoon hug. He's ready to lift your spirits—and lift you off the ground! Alijoon's treetop height makes him one of the tallest 'Mallows around, but that doesn't stop him from goofing off with his buddies, no matter their size Alijoon's planning a silent disco this weekend, and you're invited!
appearance: Alijoon is a cyan monster with pink and light pink striped horns that droop downwards. He wears a pink heart headband on top of his head and a fuzzy belly with a light pink unibrow that stretches across. He has round, black eyes with lashes and a wide smile with two triangular teeth poking from the top.

name: Alita
bio: Say hi to Alita! Want to challenge Alita to an underwater race? Alita is a super fast swimmer, and can hold her breath for five laps - she's counted! Put on your goggles and swimsuit, and hit the pool with Alita!
appearance: Alita is a SeaCow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. She has the body of a cow with a pink manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Her snout is spotted with a slightly darker pink and she has small nostrils. She has a white body with patches of black spread around her body. She has small, cream-colored triangular horns atop her head and round, black eyes.

name: Alizeh
bio: Meet Alizeh. This sly fox loves practical jokes and giving her friends a fright. Some of Alizeh's practical jokes involve costumes, fake bugs and silly string. She always gets permission when she records a good scare. Do you want to watch one of her compilation videos?
appearance: Alizeh is a red fox. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white, matching her belly. She has white markings on her face, including a round muzzle and fluffy cheeks. The markings on the tip of her tail her tail are also white. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Allegra
bio: Allegra is queen of quiches! The faces of those who challenge her throne are always marked by egg eventually but never through nefarious means. Allegations of oven manipulation at the laughable to Allegra—almost as laughable as those who claimed spinach sabotage the year prior!
appearance: Allegra is a brown Frappe cup topped with whipped cream decorated with rainbow sprinkles and teal syrup below. She has chocolate dripping down her head. She has a yellow straw on her head and a pink bunny on the right side. She has a light pink quilted sleeve on her body. She has round, black eyes and a red smile with pink blush.

name: Allina
bio: Meet Allina! She's a lifelong optimist. No matter how dark the storm clouds get, she always focuses on the bits of light peeking out from behind them! She's taking a woodworking class to learn how to make her own rocking chair so she can sit and listen to the rain from her porch.
appearance: Allina is plum-colored squirrel. She has three magenta stripes on her head and her nose and mouth are the same shade. Her face and belly are white and the insides of her ears are glittery silver. She also has a bushy plum-colored tail.

name: Ally
bio: Meet Ally the Axolotl! She's a total sweetheart who LOVES coffee, shopping, and being with family. There's nothing she loves more than a good clothing haul... except a perfectly planned vacation! When she's not with family, you can find her dreaming about her future job as a fashion buyer.
appearance: Ally is an axolotl with a striped gradient pattern in berry shades, mostly pink and purple, and a pattern of white stars scattered over the top. She has red gills with a pale pink frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a pale pink belly. She has two closed eyes with short lashes and a cat-like smile.

name: Aloeen
bio: You can usually find Aloeen driving around town. Some neighbors even know her car on sight! This 'Mallow loves driving so much, she's looking for pickup and drop-off gigs she can do for some extra cash. Could Aloeen deliver your next pizza order?
appearance: Aloeen is a latte in an aqua takeaway cup. She has a white lid with a light green straw poking out, and an aqua body with a pink band around her middle. A coffee bean-like logo design decorates her middle. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Alonzo
bio: Alonzo is renting a party bus for his birthday weekend! He wants to spread party vibes all over town with his squad. The bus has two coolers for snacks and sodas, and every rider gets a balloon and goodie bags that Alonzo put together himself. Snap some glow sticks and jump on the bus!
appearance: Alonzo is a white cow with brown spots has a patch of longer sandy fur like a fringe. He has an sandy muzzle and inner ears, and a fluffy, sandy belly He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are white. Thin  off-white line mark the horn sections. He has round, black eyes, brown nostrils and a small smile.

name: Alphonso
bio: Alphonso is a dutiful butler—to a family of ghosts! Although he cannot see them or hear them, he stays attentive to their subtle ghost cues. For instance, a chill down his spine means "fetch me my slippers!" while static on the TV means "call the cable company!"
appearance: Alphonso is a purple monster. He has eight fuzzy purple and teal octopus legs. He has purple and teal striped horns as well as a purple and teal striped belly. He has black eyes in a winking expression with a teal patch on the left eye, he has a black smiling mouth with pointy teeth.

name: Alsace Lorraine
bio: Alsace Lorraine is a personal injury attorney at the white-collar law firm of Head, Shoulders, Knees, & Toes. She specializes in vending machine malfunctions and guarantees her clients A1 settlements, even when they were the ones shaking the machine!
appearance: Alsace Lorraine is a jester. She wears a jester hat with purple on the left side and black on the right side with her face poking out. There are two pom poms on each side of her hat one black one on the left and one purple on the right. She wears a black and grey striped outfit with purple buttons and a blue ruffle. She has mischievous eyes with purple and blue make up above and below her eyes and a  pink smile

name: Alten
bio: Think you know milk? Think again! Alten is a carrot farmer with a special secret—he loves to carol! Along with his movie star sister,Arlene, Alten spends every Christmas morning regaling his neighbors with yuletide cheer and toe-tapping melodies.
appearance: Alten is a white milk carton with a red band by his center readingMILKin a white, print font andfor Santain a cursive font. Under the band he has a red and black gingham pattern, and a white lid on top with a red bow and red and white striped straw poking out by his left. He has black eyes and a red smile.

name: Althea
bio: Excuse Althea if she seems a little sleepy. She has insomnia which keeps her up at night when she would much rather be sleeping! She's tried everything, exercise, herbal tea, even counting sheep! But she makes up for it in the daytime with cat naps and lots of coffee!
appearance: Althea is a lime green color on her body with chrome gills with a teal frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a shiny, teal belly. She has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Altman
bio: Eight arms, you're in! Altman is an invaluable outfielder for his company's after-work baseball team. With suction cups for catching and slippery ink for sliding, it's no wonder this gigantically talented squid is a seven-time MVP.
appearance: Altman is a maroon squid with a triangular head with ten red tentacles. He has a light red belly, black eyes, and a black smile.

name: Alva
bio: Alva stumbles into wacky situations everywhere she goes. Some memorable experiences include the time she found the end of a rainbow, the summer she discovered a secret treasure map, and when she saw a ghost in her bathtub on Halloween! Alva can’t explain the moments — she’s just a ‘Mallow with good timing.
appearance: Alva is a dark grey Squishmallow with a lighter grey coffin-like shape with white outlines by her front. She has a skull and two crossed bones on her belly and a spider web by the right of her head. She has black eyes and a red smile.

name: Alvarez
bio: Alvarez is a sailor at heart! It used to be difficult finding water in the great, big galaxy, until Alvarez discovered a planet called Earth. Now he takes a sailboat out on salty water, and even paddles a canoe in fresh water! Alvarez just hopes no one minds the vessels he’s been borrowing.
appearance: Alvarez is a white alien with  tie dye covering his entire body and a fuzzy yellow belly. He has round eyes and a smiling mouth. He has two alien antenna with light yellow spot. He has golden spots on his body.

name: Alvie
bio: (No bio was given on tag)
appearance: Alvie is a top toy with a green point on their top and bottom. They have multiple stripes on their body colored in green, white, orange, yellow, and red. They have black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Alyssa
bio: Alyssa is a coffee shop barista who loves bringing smiles to customers' faces by whipping up delicious coffee creations. She's an animal lover and wants to become a vet one day. Make sure you try her special mallow mocha!
appearance: Alyssa is a white bird with two fluffy wings and a shimmery white belly. Her closed eyes have three short lashes on each and she has a light orange beak. She wears a sparkly golden crown atop her head.

name: Amal
bio: Tonight Amal debuts her latest fall fashion collection! Be prepared to see lots of fun prints and fluffy fabrics, as this 'Mallow is known for blending comfort and style in all her designs. Want to come to the runaway show? Amal saved you a front row seat!
appearance: Amal is a light orange moth with fuzzy tan antennae and a fuzzy white belly. She has same color wings with a pattern of white spots. She has round black eyes with short lashes, red cheeks, and a smiling black mouth.

name: Amala
bio: Meet Amala. She is a social butterfly and loves being a host. She is obsessed with balloons so there is a special balloon bouquet at all her events. Amala's favorite place to window shop is her local party supply store, she could spend hours planning the perfect balloon displays.
appearance: Amala is an axolotl with a purple gradient which is lighter on her head and gradually becomes darker. She is dotted with small, dark purple spots and has a fuzzy lilac belly. Her gills are violet with fluffy purple gills and she has small, stubby arms. She has closed, happy eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Amalie
bio: Meet Amalie. She loves slithering through the jungle with her iced coffee before she starts her day. Amalie is a vegetarian chef and works hard to keep her menu tasty and intriguing, her latest menu features jackfruit with a variety of beans. Do you want to try the nacho tower?
appearance: Amalie is a green snake with a yellow lower jaw and belly. Her belly has green stripes dividing it horizontally. She has shiny, green spots on her back and a short tail. She has round black eyes and black nostrils and mouth. A thin, pink, forked tongue pokes out from her mouth.

name: Amanda
bio: Amanda is a head baker for the Easter bunny! She makes sure all the eggs are decorated properly and any other basket goodies are ready to go.
appearance: Amanda is a light purple bunny with a colorful egg embroidered on the left side of her belly.

name: Amandine
bio: Amandine has a super exciting goal for the new year— to help at least one 'Mallow a day! Whether counseling a friend in need or volunteering at the local food bank, Amandine can't wait to lend a helping hand. After all, a little kindness goes a long way!
appearance: Amandine is a Macaron with pink, blue, white, and yellow sprinkles on top and a tie-dyed macaron shell with pink cream inside. They have black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Amara
bio: Have you met Amara? She's an expert at building snow forts and snowmen, but one of her special skills is making delicious candy! One day she wants to open up a candy shop, her first big treat might be peppermint snowballs or even peppermint and chocolate lollipops.
appearance: Amara is a yeti with a rainbow mane and a round, white face. She has a pink belly and a puff of fur design on her forehead. She has pink anime eyes with eyelashes and a pink smiling mouth with a single white tooth.

name: Amaro
bio: Amaro comes from a big family. They love to laugh, talk, and make dinner together! This fall, Amaro made the brave decision to try something new and attend a college outside of town. He's going to miss his family a lot, but knows they love and support him no matter what!
appearance: Amaro is a brown hyena with darker spots on his body. He has white, rounded ears and brown inner ears, with brown fuzz going from the top of his head to his back. He has thick tan eyebrows and belly with a darker brown muzzle. His eyes are black and so is his nose and cat-like smile.

name: Amaryllis
bio: Amaryllis wore a brown gingham dress and yellow flip-flops to her high school prom. Though this rock-n-roll rebel was hoping to make a statement on expectations and conformity and why "what's ugly to you is pretty to someone else"—she was unanimously voted Best Dressed!
appearance: Amaryllis is a lavender raccoon with black markings around her eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. Her belly is fluffy black, and she has a snout are white, and there is a thin ring of white around her raccoon round black eyes.

name: Ambergris
bio: Ambergris collects porcelain pig figurines! He thinks they're the cutest collectibles in the world and hopes to one day complete his Garden Fun and Fancy set. Let him know if you ever see the elusive Summertime Ballerina Pig at auctions!
appearance: Ambergris is brown goblin. He has black horns on his head and black pointy ears with black inner ears. On the back of Ambergris he has a brown devil-like tail. He has mischievous eyes and a black mouth with pink blush. He wears a golden crown on top his head.

name: Amberjack
bio: Amberjack just arrived to the big city with a fresh pair of character shoes, stunning high kicks, and a dream. Tomorrow is her first non-union open call, and she plans on practicing her brassy, showstopping audition song all night. Here’s hoping the other guests at her hostel like showtunes!
appearance: Amberjack is a fish taco. Her body consists of a taco shell, which is tan. She has fried fish, green lettuce, radish and a slice of lime fills the shell. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Amelia
bio: Amelia is the star of 2 different sitcoms! One is about a cheesy mouse who can’t seem to catch a break in this town and the other is about a mousy piece of cheese learning self-confidence in space. Wish her luck at the Silver Sitties this year—Amelia is competing against herself!
appearance: Amelia is a yellow mouse with large, round ears with holes. The inside of her ears and her nose are yellow and have holes. She has a white muzzle and belly, and her black eyes are framed by two short, straight whiskers on either side of her face.

name: Amelie
bio: Meet Amelie. She loves baking and painting. First, she bakes an assortment of delicious blueberry muffins, oatmeal cookies, and chocolate cakes, then she sets them up and paints a still life! Afterward, she invites all her friends over and they eat them with tea!
appearance: Amelie is a white milk carton. She has a pink band around her middle reading "MILK" in a white font, accompanied by a hot pink strawberry. Beneath that she has a cow print pattern, hot pink on white. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a red smile. Her top section is also pink and has a small straw striped in white and baby pink coming out from her head.

name: Amiah
bio: Are you ready for the show? It's Amiah's time to shine. She's been practicing all year for the talent show and she's ready to unveil her talent: magic! She has a special deck of cards and knows quite a few tricks. Will you pick the right card?
appearance: Amiah is a tie-dyed narwhal, predominantly pink with shades of peach and light red, and a white belly. She has two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on her back. An elongated, sparkly silver horn protrudes from her head. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Amideus
bio: Meet Amideus. He has Type I Diabetes and used to be very scared of finger pricks. At first, his parents took care of his blood sugar, but now he does it all by himself! On weeknights, after homework, he loves playing soccer, helping cook dinner, and talking with friends.
appearance: Amideus is an orange dinosaur with a white belly. He has lighter orange spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Amil
bio: Looking for a sparring partner? Amil is the mallow for you! He works at a boxing gym and helps many mallows perfect their form. When he's not correcting technique or cleaning up the locker room, he loves to sing oldies jams at the top of his lungs.
appearance: Amil is a light blue dinosaur. He has two small arms sticking out from his front, each with small, silver claws on the tip. His belly and the spines along his back are tie-dyed with turquoise and white. He has round, black eyes and a wide, toothy grin like a shark.

name: Amina
bio: Meet Amina. This spunky squirrel loves to read, she almost has enough books to open her own library! Amina's favorite books are about adventures in far-away places, and some type of quest. One day she wants to go on a quest of her own!
appearance: Amina is a light pink squirrel with closed eyes with 3 eyelashes on each eye and a rainbow fluffy tail. She has 3 pink stripes on the top of her head and her stomach is cream white.

name: Amir
bio: Amir is a dark green water buffalo with long light grey horns. He has dark green ears with light grey inner ears. He has a round dark grey belly. He has round, black eyes a grey muzzle and dark green nostrils.
appearance: Amir is a dark green water buffalo with long light grey horns. He has dark green ears with light grey inner ears. He has a round dark grey belly. He has round, black eyes a grey muzzle and dark green nostrils.

name: Amity
bio: Amity is the co-founder of YoHoCon, a nautical cosplay convention held at sea! There's walk-the-plank vogue offs, mermaid masterclasses and even professional divers portraying 'living barnacles'. If you're lucky, you might even see Amity's mersona—Flourish Flotsam—splashing starboard side!
appearance: Amity is a teal snake with a cracked lower jaw and belly. Their belly has light blue stripes dividing it horizontally and a short tail on their back. They wear a black headband with a skull bow. They have round black eyes with and black nostrils and mouth. A thin red, forked tongue pokes out from their mouth.

name: Amleth
bio: Amleth isn't shy about claiming his own space and asking for alone time. This 'Mallow doesn't have siblings and never got the hang of sharing, but with a little patience, Amleth will open up and maybe even let you sit at his lunch table. Wanna to trade juice boxes?
appearance: Amleth is a white yeti with a round pale grey face. He has grey horns on either side of his head and a puff of fur on his forehead. He has round black eyes, as well as a smiling mouth. He also has a fuzzy grey belly with a snowflake on the right side of it.

name: Amor
bio: Amor means love, and that is exactly what this unicorn is all about. Though she doesn't always know how to explain her feelings, she knows no matter what you are, you deserve to be loved.
appearance: Amor is a light pink unicorn with a pink, glittery horn. She has a rainbow mane. The inside of her ears are a shiny pink, like her horn. Her belly is decorated with rainbow stripes which fan out from the center.

name: Amparo
bio: Amparo wakes up bright and early so she can make her family a big, scrumptious breakfast. With Día de los Muertos around the corner, Amparo's making her famous hot chocolate, churned with a molinillo to give it a frothy texture. Would you like cinnamon in yours?
appearance: Amparo is a purple chicken with small fluffy wings with green tips. She has a white flower on her belly with sugar skull design. She has an orange comb on the top of his head. She wears sugar skull make up on her forehead with a flower in the middle. She has a yellow beak with an orange wattle with round, black eyes. She has white flower like patterns around her orange patches on her eyes.

name: Analea
bio: Volcanos and earthquakes are scary to some, but Analea has been fascinated with them since her very first earthquake! She is going to school to become a geologist and can't wait to learn more!
appearance: Analea is a light purple caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has seven dark purple stripes: three on top of her head, and two on each side of her body. Her horn, a shimmering blue-green, protrudes from the center stripe on her head. Her inner ears are also a shimmering blue-green. She has a white muzzle that is triangular at the top and round at the bottom. Her nose and mouth are dark purple. She has two black whiskers on each side of her face, round black eyes with short lashes, and an off-white fuzzy belly.

name: Anara
bio: Anara invented an app for her favorite hobby-karaoke! With her app, karaoke can be sung anytime, anywhere, which is exactly why Anara came up with an idea. You never know when you might have some spare time, so why not spend it singing your favorite song!
appearance: Anara a light green Artichoke with green spots and her outer petals around her, and she has black closed eyes with short lashes and a black mouth, she also has pin blush on her cheeks.

name: Anastasia
bio: If you need some help starting a project, Anastasia is the axolotl for you! Anastasia is a planner and likes to be prepared for everything, she keeps track of her ideas by writing lists. What can she help you with?
appearance: Anastasia is a pale blue color on her body with chrome gills with a bright blue frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly. She has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Anca
bio: Safety first! Anca is a crossing guard and helps with the morning busses at school. Anca gets up so early, sometimes it's still dark out! Anca wears a bright green reflective vest and has matching gloves in case they need to direct any cars. Maybe one day, they can help you cross the street!
appearance: Anca is a blue unicorn with a white muzzle and belly. Their horn and inner ears are shimmering silver, and the horn features a darker blue spiral. They have a white, fluffy mane and tail. They have closed, happy eyes with three spiky eyelashes on each.

name: Anders
bio: (no bio was given on tag)
appearance: Anders is Blue Peep-styled Chick, and he has a blue beak with black rounded eyes with lashes.

name: Anderson
bio: Anderson loves to knit and decorate for the holidays. Every year, she knits all her friends unique scarves and embroiders each one with their name! Want to bundle up in one of her creations? Anderson would love to knit a personalized sweater just for you!
appearance: Anderson is a light grey seal with two flat flippers on each side. She has a round, white muzzle and belly. Her facial features, including nose, mouth, round eyes, short lashes and whiskers are all black. She wears a red scarf with snowflakes.

name: Andreina
bio: Meet Andreina. She is a nurse who books her time from sun-up to sun-down. She works out almost every morning and spends a few minutes in her garden for clarity. In her free time, Andreina loves to sunbathe and entertain. She loves spending time in her beautiful rooftop garden.
appearance: Andreina is pink. She has shiny white belly with pink stripes. Her antennae are black with pink rounds on the end. Her wings are black with pink ovals and some white spots. She has black eyes with two short eyelashes on each, pink blushing cheeks, and a smiling mouth.

name: Andres
bio: Andres is a very silly Squishmallow, he loves practical jokes and hearing people laugh. He wants to be a comedian when he grows up, do you know any good jokes he can tell?
appearance: Andres is a light brown dog with floppy, triangular ears. He has a scruffy tan face and white markings on his forehead, muzzle and belly. He has round black eyes and a matching nose and mouth.

name: Andrew
bio: Meet Andrew. He enjoys listening to music and going to concerts. You can often find him streaming music or waiting for news on his favorite band's tour. If you need a concert buddy, Andrew is the jackalope for you!
appearance: Andrew is a jackalope, a mythical creature that is a jackrabbit with antelope antlers. He has a tan body and long, vertical ears with pink inner ears. He has two antlers with two points each between his ears. He has a white, fuzzy belly and tail. He has round, black eyes and a brown nose and mouth.

name: Androu
bio: Meet Androu. Androu is a really crafty 'Mallow - he loves to whittle all kinds of different shapes and designs out of the wood! One of his favorite designs is a tiny collection of stars in the shape of his favorite constellation. Can you guess which one it is?
appearance: Androu is a squirrel with grey fur. He has dark grey stripes on his head, and his nose and mouth are gold His face and his fluffy belly are white, and the insides of his ears are golden . He also has a bushy dark grey tail.

name: Andy
bio: Andy decided to host holiday dinner this year for all his 'Mallow pals. There's just one tiny problem-- Andy doesn't know how to cook! He decided to practice with one recipe--veggie lasagna--and turn the dinner into potluck! Now everyone's invited to bring yummy dishes.
appearance: Andy is a green christmas tree with a plaid red Santa hat atop his head. Three row of christmas lights with red stars are wrapped around him with small, circular lights in red, blue, white, and green. He has black eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Aneira
bio: Meet Aneira. She loves painting, working at her cafe. and singing along with her friendHenley. Aneira and Henley do almost everything together. She is working on a painting as a surprise for her friend, would you like to see it?
appearance: Aneira is a pink Pegacorn in the style of a Hug Mee. Her horn, wings, and inner ears are a glittery gold. Her hair consists of pink, purple and blue strands, she also has the same pattern on her tail. Her belly and muzzle are white with pink and teal holographic hearts on her belly. Her eyes with eyelashes are closed in a happy expression as she has a black smile and pink nostrils.

name: Anessa
bio: Anessa can sew a flower crown with her eyes closed. She credits her mother and grandmother for her unique sense of fashion, and is inspired by their flowy, colorful dresses. Anessa embroiders her own dresses by hand, and tops off her ensembles with a flower crown to give it her signature look.
appearance: Anessa is a black Squishmallow with a white, skull-shaped face. She has red floral designs around her eyes, a red flower on her chest, and is decorated with intricate Sugar Skull-style patterns all over. She wears a flower crown made up of red, pink, and yellow flowers.

name: Aneta
bio: Aneta is thrifty gal who's great at pinching pennies; Aneta's hobby is couponing and finding bargains wherever she can, so you can always ask her how to get the best deal! Want to go shopping with Aneta?
appearance: Aneta is a red lobster with lobster claws, antennae, and tail, on her cream tummy there words that spell out "CLAWSOME!" Her face consists of black eyes and simple black smile.

name: Angelica
bio: Angelica loves shapes! When she isn't playing the triangle or biking in circles, you can find her working with rectangles at the local picture frame store. Angelica is so good at helping customers hang their photos straight, her boss even gave her a new nickname: "Angle-ica"
appearance: Angelica is a cup of pink yoghurt. On top of her head is swirled strawberry frozen yoghurt with rainbow sprinkles. On the right side of Angelica there is a blueberry and a strawberry. There is a silver spoon poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a smiling red mouth. Her cup is white with a green bottom and stripe.

name: Angelie
bio: Ready, set go - Angelie is on the move! She and her best friendXeniapractically live at the skate park. Angelie wants to be the first unicorn pro-skater, do you want to see some of her moves?
appearance: Fenella is a unicorn with a marble coat, predominantly pink with shades of coral and light red. She has a plain white belly. Her inner ears and muzzle are white, and she has a shiny silver pink. Her nostrils and the swirl on her horn are hot pink. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes and white shine, as well as a candy pink mane.

name: Angelie the Koala
bio: (no bio given on tag)
appearance: Angelie is a light pink with a hot pink 'Bubble Yum' wrapper on their lower half. They have fluffy rainbow colored ears, a big egg shaped black nose, a small smile, and two small round eyes with eyelashes.

name: Angie
bio: Angie loves a good fiesta, she loves going to parties and events as much as she enjoys hosting. When she hosts, she makes special themed food and drinks for her friends. Want to know some of her favorite things to make? Guacamole, peanut butter brownies, and samosas!
appearance: Angie is a golden orange dog with upright, triangular ears. She has a white muzzle and belly, as well as white inner ears and round, eyebrow-like markings above her eyes. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black.

name: Angus
bio: Angus is a compliment comic—and he doesn't care who he pleases! Everyone is a fair games at his shows, from the baby so cute flight attendants thank him for crying to the lady with eyes so green they can't get a job. And someone please apprehend the gentleman in Row G—he clearly stole a Roman statue's jawline!
appearance: Angus is a cow burger. He is made up of buns with a patty, cheese, lettuce and tomato in the center. The burger bun is black with sesame seeds on top of his head. He has grey horns with black ears and grey inner ears. He has round, black eyes a grey nose with black nostrils.

name: Angusan
bio: Meet Angusan. They love late-night movie marathons with their friends. They load up on blankets, pillows and snacks! Popcorn and red licorice are two of Angusan’s favorites! When they grow up, they want to be a cinematographer and create their own movie magic!
appearance: Angusan is a purple TV with yellow antennae on their head, buttons on the bottom, and a silver screen for a face. Both of their eyes are open with a smiling face and pink cheeks.

name: Anh Dao
bio: Congratulations to Anh Dao! This avant-garde fashion designer just premiered her fall accessory collection. Centered around everyday objects, it includes a traffic cone purse, a garbage bag bandana, and a dried spaghetti headpiece. Though some call her designs puzzling, Anh Dao calls them groundbreaking!
appearance: Anh Dao is a magenta dodo bird with a white mask marking and belly. She has a triangular, white beak with an orange tip. She has fuzzy, pink wings with white on the end and a fuzzy, olive green tail. She has round, black eyes rimmed in peach.

name: Anica
bio: Although Anica is a unicorn, she sleeps like a bear! In fact, Anica sleeps almost 16 hours a day; she sleeps more than she's actually awake! When Anica finally wakes up from her deep sleep, she's always very well-rested, energized, and ready to play with her pals.
appearance: Anica is a tie-dyed rainbow unicorn with white inner ears, muzzle, and belly. A glittery, white unicorn horn sits on her head with pink, blue, and yellow swirls around it, she has a multi-colored mane with the same yellow, blue, and pink colors. She has a long tail, closed eyes with lashes, and her nostrils are pink. She has XOXO written in pink and a red heart embroidered on her belly.

name: Aniceta
bio: Aniceta is a white cow with brown spots, she has a pink snout with black nostrils and she has pink inside her white ears, and she has grey horns. Her face consists of black eyes with a white pupil in them.
appearance: Aniceta is a white cow with brown spots, she has a pink snout with black nostrils and she has pink inside her white ears, and she has grey horns. Her face consists of black eyes with a white pupil in them.

name: Aniela
bio: Can you feel the burn? Aniela can! This peppy pilates instructor loves helping her students find their inner— and outer— strength. With her emphasis on crunches and planks, they're bound to!
appearance: Aniela is a white coffee maker pot with a brown top, handle, and bottom with two lighter brown highlights. She has black eyes with short lashes, a black smiling mouth, and pink blush.

name: Anita
bio: She may look soft and sweet but watch out for Anita! This cinnamon roll has a black belt and teaches self defense classes. Anita calls herself a gym rat and loves to show her students to stay safe and strong. Will you sign up for her next class?
appearance: Anita is a light brown cinnamon roll slathered in white icing. The icing covers her head and drips down her body, and has a brown and light pink spiral loosely with pink heart sprinkles. She has round, black eyes and a pink smiling mouth.

name: Anjali
bio: Anjali collects tea sets of all kinds. Her favorites are teeny tiny ones she can barely hold, so this delicate elephant displays them in a special cabinet. Anjali has been collecting tea sets since she was a young 'Mallow and has no plans of stopping. Want to go antiquing  for new tea sets with Anjali?
appearance: Anjali is a lavender elephant she has large, floppy ears with a water-color pattern, which contains light blue, white, pink and purple on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She has round, black eyes with dual lashes. She wears a teal flower with a pink pistil on the right side of her head.

name: Anjara
bio: Anjara runs tech for the morning news of her local TV station. She's responsible for the lights, teleprompter, and announcing when they're back on air from commercial. Anjara sure has a lot of responsibility, but this burrito is up for the challenge!
appearance: Anjara is a burrito wrapped up in a green tortilla, Her top reveals bacon strips, avocado slices, and scrambled eggs. She has a holographic, silver wrap around her with the top flipped over.

name: Ankur
bio: Ankur doesn't make grilled cheese--he makes grilled cheez! This lifelong vegan blends hummus, cornstarch, and 16 secret spices to create the perfect faux cheese. Slathered over grilled sourdough, it's not cheddar: It's better!
appearance: Ankur is a mushroom with a cyan stalk and teal cap. The spots on his cap and belly are a fuzzy cobalt blue. He has black eyes and a red smile.

name: Anna
bio: Anna spends a lot of time with her family and loves to read. You can almost always find her curled up with a good book and some freshly made chocolate chip cookies.
appearance: Anna is a light pink dinosaur with a white belly. She has dark pink spines running down her back. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. She has the phrase 'xoxo' written on her chest in red, accompanied by the hot pink outline of a heart.

name: Annalise
bio: Here is one alicorn you'll be happy to meet. Annalise loves martial arts and solving puzzles, especially if she can help save the day! She loves to host mystery game nights, do you want to join in the fun?
appearance: Annalise is a pegacorn, a combination of a pegasus and a unicorn. This means that she has a unicorn hornandpegasus wings, all of which are gold Her inner ears are white with pink and yellow dots. Her body is pink and she has a white muzzle and belly. Her belly has pink, yellow, and blue dots. Her fluffy mane and tail are hot pink. She has closed eyes with long, curled lashes.

name: Anneli
bio: Anneli is the carpool queen who plays the best tunes! She is the oldest of five siblings, so she's been zooming her friends and family around from the moment she got her driver's license. Anneli is on her way to scoop you up now!
appearance: Anneli is a teal ferret whose triangular ears, belly and muzzle are white. She has a baby blue mask marking over her eyes which is outlined with fluffy white fur. She has round, black eyes and a teal nose. She is also wearing a red headband with hearts on top.

name: Annette
bio: Annette doesn't care much for high-speed thrills—according to her, life moves fast enough! She loves exploring quieter spots of the park while her family ride rollercoasters and always seems to find them again with a few jumbo stuffed animals. She's particularly talented at ring toss!
appearance: Annette is a coral cup of milkshake. On top of her head is swirled whipped cream with rainbow sprinkles. She has rainbow poking out of the right side of her head. There is a striped pink, blue, and white straw poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has strawberry syrup dripping out with rainbow sprinkles. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a smiling mouth.

name: Anni
bio: Anni cozies up at home every chance she gets. Nothing's better than staying home on the weekend and ordering plankton pizza! Anni loves to read and take lots of naps, especially with the TV on. Sometimes. Anni puts on the old movie channel just to help her drift off to dreamland...
appearance: Anni  is a pale purple jellyfish with white markings on her belly. The end of her belly has a wavy design. Her tentacles are made from yellow, purple, and white ribbons, and her oral arms are made from a shimmery fabric. She has a black rounded eyes with short lashes and a mouth.

name: Anouk
bio: Anouk is quite the beauty queen. She has a closet filled with shoes, makeup, and accessories for almost every occasion. Her motto is 'dress for success' and she loves a bold look that stands out, especially with makeup. Her signature lip color is a berrylicious pink!
appearance: Anouk is covered in a blue tie-dye pattern with swirls of pink, yellow and purple. She has a white muzzle and belly, and her belly is fluffy. Her horn and inner ears are metallic pink. Her multi-colored mane includes  pink, silver, and light purple.  Her eyes are closed, with a few curved lashes on each.

name: Anoushka
bio: Some 'Mallows exercise to EDM or hip-hop but not, Anoushka! This flap happy parakeet much prefers the soothing sounds of an ASMR track to get her fit on. Her favorite? "Auditory Office: Everybody, Let's Staple".
appearance: Anoushka is a parakeet (budgie), a type of small parrot. She has a lavender head, and body and a light grey belly hidden beneath her hoodie. She has a purple sherpa hoodie with white laces Her wings grey with lavender feathers. She has a rounded, yellow beak with a pale lavender above it, as well as round, black eyes with lashes.

name: Ansel
bio: Ansel is an actor! He just made his professional debut in The Howdy Hey Dinner Revue and it couldn't have gone better. "Sheriff So-So" remembered all the steps to the jig, successfully lassoed the bandits, and was even able to bring Wagon #40 more ketchup during the big finale number!
appearance: Ansel is a red opened chip bag with dark red on the bottom. He has a white logo with crinkle cut chips. He has crinkle cut potato chips in his bag. His face consists of black simple eyes and a smile with light pink blush.

name: Anthony
bio: Anthony is the oldest of his brothers and does his best to keep them in line. He helps them with homework, bullies, and teaches them to be smart, fun, and kind.
appearance: Anthony has a grey body and tan stomach. His eyes are black and surrounded by a white design, along with white markings on his sides and head.

name: Antjuan
bio: Want to join Antjuan for a poetry reading? He's about to start another epic poem and wants to read aloud with some of his 'Mallow pals! Antjuan makes silly voices for all the different characters. Be sure to bring a highlighter and pencil to keep track of the story's twists and turns!
appearance: Antjuan is a bronze monster with dark cyan horns, fin-like flaps with golden lines on the sides of his body, and a dark cyan belly with powder teal hearts. He has three dark cyan hearts on the right side of his. His eyes are black and light pink mouth with pointy white teeth.

name: Antoine
bio: Meet Antoine. He is super smart and loves a good challenge. You can find him working on crosswords, putting together puzzles, and solving riddles! Got something you can't figure out? Ask Antoine! He is always willing to lend a helping hand.
appearance: Antonie is a tan jar of peanut butter with a bright blue lid and label. There is a brown peanut on the label. He has round black eyes, a red smiling mouth and pale pink blush.

name: Antonella
bio: Antonella is a baker; she makes delicious bread in the shape of a 'Mallow! She has to get up very early to bake enough for the farmers market, but sometimes she still runs out. Her latest creation is a four-cheese crust, would you like a taste?
appearance: Antonella is a cheetah. Antonella's coat is hot pink and is covered in white speckles with a pink outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a pink nose and black mouth. She also has sparkling pink inner ears.

name: Antoni
bio: This is one creative sea turtle. Antoni loves to build things: puzzles, block towers, and model cars. He even builds things with his breakfast! Once he made a scrambled egg tower with salsa for lava and a toast drawbridge. What should he build next?
appearance: Antoni is a green turtle with a tuft of white hair atop his head. He has a white belly and two flippers (one on each side). He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back is a brown tie-dyed shell.

name: Anu
bio: Anu meditates every day in their own special way — on a pool floaty! Anu loves floating on their back, feeling weightless, and just being present in the moment. They're thinking of finally sticking to the daily meditation! Grab a floaty and join Anu in their serenity pool.
