They have thin, white, curved horns which sit wide from their head. They have round, black eyes, gold nostrils and a golden nose ring. They also have a long, blue tail with a dark blue fluffy end. They have two spots one on their right eye and one on the right side of their body. They also have a blue flower on their belly.

name: Bermuda
bio: Bermuda isn't good with money—she's great with money! This clever third-grade math teacher is crafty with coupons, smart about stocks, and could probably earn a PhD in credit card rewards. In fact, she just used her latest points to—purchase a motel?!
appearance: Bermuda is a sloth with a yellow body and a white patch on her face and belly. The banded markings around her eyes and her muzzle are yellow. She has a pale yellow belly with a pineapple embroidered on the right side. She has round black eyes, a brown round nose and a cat-like smile.

name: Berna
bio: Meet Berna. This narwhal is one clever lawyer. She's dedicated and hardworking, she loves thinking creatively to makes things happen. Berna hopes to help change the world, one day at a time.
appearance: Berna is a tie-dyed narwhal, predominantly blue shades ranging from cobalt to ice blue, with a white belly. She has two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on her back. An elongated, sparkly silver horn protrudes from her head. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.Her horn in real life is rather, flimsy

name: Bernard
bio: Bernard puts together the most elaborate picnics! He spreads out a big blanket on the lawn of his favorite seaweed forest and arranges homemade snacks, drinks, and utensils all on a little shell table. You're invited to join Bernard on his next picnic!
appearance: Bernard is a tie-dyed grey shark with a white belly. He has two dorsal fins with one atop his head and one on his back, alongside two pectoral fins on his sides and a tail fin under him. He has "You're Jawsome!" embroidered in grey on his belly with two red hearts beside "You're" and a red heart inside the O of "Jawsome". He has black eyes and an open mouth with white, sharp teeth and a red inner mouth.

name: Bernardo
bio: Are you ready for a spicy surprise? Be sure to catch Bernardo on the baby grand every Friday night. He sings and plays the piano, but with a little twist. He only sings in Spanish, and by the time you leave, you might sing in Spanish too!
appearance: Bernardo is a burrito with round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. His body is made up of a tortilla in a white wrap, which is flipped over to reveal shiny silver on the inside. Meat, tomato, lettuce and cheese spill out from the top of the tortilla.

name: Bernice
bio: Blissful, bubbly and bright. Three words to describe the best boba you'll meet! Bernice is sweet, but not too sweet, and always lends a helping hand to her friends.
appearance: Bernice is a cup of light brown boba tea filled with dark brown pearls. She has round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth. She has a pastel colored lid with a green straw poking out from the right side.

name: Bernie
bio: Bernie loves the mountains and helping other people more than anything else in the world. Bernie’s dream is to become an Emergency Medical Technician (EMT) in order to assist in mountain rescues. When he’s not saving lives, you will find Bernie enjoying the snowy weather. He keeps himself entertained by romping, rolling and pulling his friends on sleds!
appearance: Bernie is a reddish-brown dog with white markings. These appear as a wide stripe from the top of his head to his muzzle, which is also white, and on his belly. He has darker brown ears which are triangular and folded over. He has a black nose and mouth, as well as black eyes ringed in white.

name: Berrina
appearance: Berrina is a pink jar of strawberry jelly (jam) with a pale pink lid. Red jelly leaks from under her lid and drips down her face. She has a pale pink label with two strawberries, a smaller pink one and a larger red one, laughing. The label also has a yellow bubble that says 'EXTRA FUN' in green.

name: Berry
bio: Choose your own adventure books are Berry's favorite kind, she loves to have options! Last week she went on a treasure hunt and saved a guppy in distress! What kind of adventure book should she read next?
appearance: Berry is a pale teal lamb with a white face. Her nose is silver and shaped like a heart. She has closed eyes with curled lashes and a sweet, smiling mouth. Her belly and inner ears are white and fluffy.

name: Bertha
bio: Bertha is one sassy receptionist! (But also really shy and intoverted!) So while she might think of something super mmmmmhm to say! (She'll probably just think it.) Because if Bertha said it out loud, you couldn't even take it! (Neither could she.)
appearance: Bertha is a magenta elephant she has large, floppy ears which resemble butterfly wings that have light purple  inner ears with a butterfly pattern, which contains magenta dots and pale-purple pattern. She has an embroidered trunk. She has round, black eyes.

name: Bertie
bio: Bertie is one cool 'Mallow. In fact, they might be the coolest 'Mallow around! They like to keep their room super cold all the time, but they have plenty of comfy blankets for guests. Make sure you pack a jacket if you go to visit Bertie!
appearance: Bertie is a teal waffle with a diamond pattern all over. Bertie's body is folded into a taco shape with three scoops of ice cream—covered with dessert syrup and sprinkles—sticking out from between the layers; a vanilla scoop with purple syrup, a blue scoop with green syrup, and a strawberry scoop with red syrup & a cherry on top. There is also a wavy flat pink piece of fabric stretched out behind the ice cream scoops, likely meant to represent more ice cream. They have black rounded eyes, a red mouth, and pink blushing cheeks.

name: Bertwin
bio: Meet Bertwin. He loves coffee, reading, and combing his beard. He loves to read books about magic and mystery and is even working on his own novel. Bertwin gets pretty distracted so he needs a study buddy to help him stay focused on his writing; will you help him write?
appearance: Bertwin is a yellow bearded dragon, a type of lizard. He has a white belly and three brown markings on his back, above his tail. He has fringes that protrude from either side of his head. He has round, black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Bessa
bio: Meet Bessa. Bessa loves activities that others might find frightening! White water rafting, skydiving, or even zip-lining, there is nothing too scary. Bessa's biggest dream is to one day break the land speed record and become the fastest 'Mallow alive! So don't blink or you might miss her!
appearance: Bessa is a pale grey pig with pink details inside her ears, on her snout and on her belly. Her ears are triangular and flop forwards. She has two round, black eyes and a curly tail.

name: Bessem
bio: Bessem puts the "show" in "real estate showing" in fact, she razzle-dazzles potential buyers with her famous Opera House Open Mics. If you're lucky, Bessem might even perform her own stand-up comedy set. Did you ever hear the one about the granite countertops?
appearance: Bessem is a mint bigfoot with a fuzzy pink mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has sparkly pink pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts, and 3 toes. She has black eyes, a wide mouth which stretches across her face, and a white tooth sticking out of the right side of her mouth.

name: Bessie
bio: Bessie organizes community events! Whether it's a block party for the grand opening of a new business, or fundraising for a 5K race, she makes sure the whole town is involved. Want to know what Bessie is planning next? It's the yearly toy drive!
appearance: Bessie is a bat mixed with a blueberry, she has a blue calyx sitting atop her head, tall, triangular ears and bat wings by her sides. Her inner ears, wing webbing, and belly are an off-white purple. Her eyes with lashes are closed and she has a blueberry embroidered on her belly, and her smile is red, with no fangs poking out the bottom like other bats.

name: Beth
bio: Beth is a registered dietician! She specializes in heart-healthy meals like pan-roasted pork chops and hopes one day to open a grease-free roadside diner: The Heart What It Wants. Remember to bring your running shows, you'll have to high-knee to your seat!
appearance: Beth is a bluish-grey bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and blue belly with hearts one blue and one gold, and blue pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Bethany
bio: Bethany's favorite meal is breakfast, especially fresh biscuits and jam! Her mom makes them every Friday for dinner. On the weekends, Bethany helps her mom in the garden, tending to all the yummy berries she uses for jam.
appearance: Bethany is a purple koalacorn, a koala with a unicorn horn. She has furry, round ears that are multi-colored, mainly pink, purple, and blue. She has an oval nose which is black, and a small smile. She has round, black eyes with curled eyelashes. Her horn is either shiny rainbow or a shimmering pink, depending on the release, with a spiral pattern pointing upward.

name: Bethuna
bio: Meet Bethuna. She is a personal trainer with a giant sweet tooth. Bethuna's favorite dessert is a scoop of mint chocolate chip ice cream, and she'll usually enjoy it after a long run outside! And even though she has a sweet tooth, she doesn't let it stop her from hitting the gym every day!
appearance: Bethuna is a mystical creature with features similar to a dragon. She has a green body and her muzzle, belly and fuzzy mane are yellow. She has small, white fangs under her muzzle and two long, black horns with thin, yellow stripes. The edges of her wings are black and the insides of her wings and ears are shiny gold. Bethuna's body, belly, muzzle, and mane all glow under black light.

name: Bette
bio: Bette loves studying the local subway map. She appreciates the intricacies of its design and always marvels at just how many 'Mallows it moves a day. Though she currently attends nursing school, Bette sometimes thinks she should attend train conductor school!
appearance: Bette is an aqua flying fish with a pale teal belly. She has hologram wing-like fins on each side of her body as well as holographic pelvic fins on the bottom of her. Her face has wide open black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth with light pink blush. She has a large teal stripe on top of her head.

name: Betty
bio: Betty loves a good thrill! Whether it's rock climbing or skydiving, this daredevil will do anything to satisfy her thirst for adventure! She tries to push people out of their comfort zones, yet respects her friends' decisions to not join her.
appearance: Betty is a black bat with long, upright ears and a purple belly. She has round, black eyes rimmed with white. Her red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.
